name: exp_package_test_v1
description: A simple package ready for npm

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm publish --tag alpha && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:new: npm version pre patch --preid=alpha && npm publish --tag alpha && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm publish --tag rc && git push && git push --tags
